# CanPL_Analysis

<!-- badges: start -->
[![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/O4O342A2A)

The goal of `CanPL_Analysis` is to provide some examples for creating a ETL pipeline with the {googledrive} package and Github Actions.

Please check out the blog post for full instructions!
